text: 29th Street is a 1991 American biographical comedy drama movie directed by George Gallo and was based on the story by Frank Pesce (who also stars) and James Franciscus. It stars Danny Aiello, Anthony LaPaglia, Lainie Kazan, Robert Forster, Rick Aiello and Ron Karabatsos and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1991 comedy-drama movies Category:1990s biographical movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:American biographical movies Category:Movies set in the 1970s Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by George Gallo
title: 29th Street (movie)
